bow: what something you wish you would have known or had when you had baby hi curious as to if there any thing or information you moms out there wish you would have had when you had baby this could be for example any item you did think to buy or any bit of wisdom that helped you out thanks for the replies figured this out pretty quick but people like to say sleep when the baby sleeps ok sure but here the real key most babies have fussy time 9pm or so is classic it often causes working daddies to think their babies hate them it not that baby is just mentally worn out from his day anyway after grumpy time and the cluster nursing that usually goes with it will be baby longest sleep period go to bed the dishes can wait do care if it 7pm this is your best chance for 5hrs of uninterrupted sleep you will feel much more sane if you re getting at least one 4hr stretch of sleep at night removed contact nipple shield say this in everyone of these for ftms those velcro swaddle clothes also the mirror said no to the mirror initially after bit my doc just brought it in once saw the little guys head popping out had power boost like no body business cord clamping my husband and both had jaundice as an infant we have little to no contact with our moms clamp the cord asap if this is true for you delaying cord clamping has benefits but also increases bilirubin what responsible for jaundice our child was close to having severe brain damage due to his jaundice was few points away from the blood brain barrier number nothing fun about watching your newborn having an iv placed in their head due to mommy lack of research that about it babies do need everything asap like you think they grow in and out of certain things and it well spaced out imo edit format issues do buy every gadget do buy too many of one size of clothing they rarely stay in sizes as long as you expect having 20 outfits for months sounds reasonable until you realize your kid has outgrown them months in and half of the outfits still have tags on swaddling is awesome neither of our kids slept well without it initially we used halo sleepsack http www target com halo swaddlesure adjustable swaddle wrap animal print 50584742 ref=tgt adv xs000000 amp afid=google pla df amp cpng= amp adgroup= amp lid=700000001170770pgs amp network=g amp device=c amp location=1026132 amp gclid=cmbx3vdj9s8cfuu8gqod808a4a amp gclsrc=aw ds our first slept with it the longest just kept sizing up our younger stopped needing it around month even if they said no tongue tie ask them to get someone trained to check with finger inside the mouth just looking is enough not mom but im dad get that nose frida thing sucks out boogers its awesome zipper onsies over buttons your husband will thank you if you breast feed get the kindle baby bottle warmer its dad proof so we dont over heat the liquid gold umm what else think having dad baby bag separate from mom baby bag is important dad baby bag has essentials mom baby bag has like different outfits umbrella spare bottles nipples juice and all this random crap that isnt needed diapers wipes one bottle changes of clothes maybe some bibs and cloth to wipe the babies mouth but nothing outlandish the first few months baby is always gon na want mom but over time he will learn to like dad dad job at first is to be mom supporter keep excess vistors out cook try to sleep etc accept help when you can like if someone asks if they can help ask them to bring some home cooked food or something saves bunch of time dishes and you can get more sleep and its not like fast food or anything baby thermometer and medicine is necessity after that 3month round of immunization shots she will get sick its gon na break your heart but yeah just some tips from stay at home dad do you mean the kiinde system if you are breast feeding accept that the baby may not follow schedule and you may be feeding every hour for period of time was way too obsessed with how long it had been since the last feeding how short specifically and when finally surrendered to it we were both so much happier the breastfeeding app made me obsessive found if just let him eat when he was hungry we were both much happier loved the breast friend feeding pillow kept the baby at perfect position where the bobby let him slip around lot used it for about months get out of the house when you feel up to it found that we got in routine where we were both fussy but when we got out of the house he would quit obsessing about the boob and sleep bit the stroller was amazing the happiest baby on the block and solving your child sleep problems were must reads for us zutano booties were the only thing we could keep on his feet and those little mittens for newborns were great for winter he hated being swaddled with his arms in milk barn bibs are big enough that they cover the entire front of the kid and protect from big throw ups these are by far our favorite bibs still freezer meals were life saver in the months after birth totally do that make healthy stuff because if people bring you food it will be heavy comfort food type stuff you ll be dying for veggies that all can think of for now amazon prime is the best next day shipping on baby items was must think about alternative plans what if breastfeeding does work out what if one swaddle does work does baby prefer one bottle over another we used sample bottles for day and baby hated them so we next day amazoned bottles do buy big items until you know that your baby would like them whats is jaundice from denmark and clueless is needed then why is my husband always taking me chapstick out of my bag and using it my diaper bag is now my purse you might not think you ll need those tissues pen or granola bar but you ll be glad when you realize you do for real no offense meant different strokes for different folks like to be prepared this is little sappy but when was pregnant everyone told me their horror stories oh man wait until this happens or you wo believe that or sleep now because you re never going to sleep again etc but there was one woman who had kids little older than mine who made point just to tell me now and then throughout my first pregnancy how could not even imagine how much love was going to have for my child how amazing it was going to be even if it was hard how much more love and laughter would have in my life she really encouraged me and you know what she was right mayo clinic def http www mayoclinic org diseases conditions infant jaundice basics definition con 20019637 write down all the firsts first smile first word first solid foods etc thought would remember but did now that my son has been diagnosed with adhd have been asked lot about his developmental milestones and was able to remember specific dates kept notepad near the bed or nursing area and wrote just couple lines each day actually started writing during the pregnancy my son is almost and write in his journal every night love reading through the old ones because do remember anything from those sleep deprived times until reread it happiest baby on the block was winner here too the were crucial in getting our newborn to sleep amp on somewhat of schedule those first three months here is what learned that share with all my friends when they become new moms laidback breastfeeding http www mothering com articles natural breastfeeding was having lot of trouble nursing until started just leaning back it seems like such small thing but it helped us so much clusterfeeding sometimes my little guy would want to eat every hour sometimes our day was spent with him nursing falling asleep waking up nursing again thought something was wrong but clusterfeeding is very common thing baby might hate its bassinet or crib after two nights of baby waking every 15 minutes unless he was held we went out and bought rock play https www amazon com fisher price newborn rock sleeper meadow dp b014d50lcy ref=sr it it saved our lives he started sleeping hours at time in it which made life manageable some people are comfortable with using these for sleep but we talked to our pediatrician about it and she was okay with it buy food you can eat with one hand granola bars burritos sandwiches those first few weeks always seemed to have baby in my arms and it made it hard to eat with two hands babywearing lets you get stuff done we used boba wrap which takes little practice but there are ton of wraps and slings available out there baby would sleep on me in the wrap for hours while did load of laundry made myself sandwich went for walk around the neighborhood it was the best ditto if out and about with baby my purse is the diaper bag try to keep at least shirt for me and husband because ve been there with spit up on my shirt with no change also randomly change out the outfits and diapers in the diaper bag because they are no use if your nuggets have out grown them yea that one lol removed do wait to see lactation consultant my hospital did have one available before we left and it was days before we saw one my son lost fair bit of weight and we were all miserable if you re having milk supply issues rent the hospital grade pump drink water every time the baby nurses eat just eat do get on your baby board and read about all of the women who are in their old clothes at and or whatever weeks they can go to hell your body wo be back to normal for long time not everyone loses weight when they breastfeed muslin blankets for summer babies they serve million purposes spring for newborn pics they change so rapidly in the first month get travel system it great having car seat that clicks into stroller get simple caddy for the first few months you do need to lug around big stroller for pound baby that gulsot baby clothing sizing is dumb it would make way more sense for them to market it by weight my week old is wearing month sized clothing because shes fatty initially did realize the weight thing or that month size is really month is and so on until she was too big to wear outfits had set aside because was waiting for her to get to that age as opposed to that weight size height weight months 20 24 13 lbs months 24 26 13 17 lbs months 26 28 17 20 lbs 12 months 28 30 20 23 lbs yes buy diaper bag you really like because it also your handbag for the next few years also look for one with pocket at the back that where you ll stash your phone and keys for easy access my husband and try to do this but end up getting so stressed out about needing to fall asleep in hopes of getting those few precious hours that ca sleep even though super tired the more time that passes the worse it gets because get so panicky about the potential sleep losing any tips on how to overcome that there so much to breastfeeding that one class ca teach so joining facebook groups and talking with other moms is huge advantage thx alcohol with dinner no clock in your room zzzquil melatonin take hylands calms tablets that are simply amazing have anxiety and have fear of taking medication take those and they calm all of my nerves help me sleep afraid not ca fall asleep was something dealt with when my guy was newbie maybe stupid question but what happen if you get cozy in bed close your eyes and think about romantic beach vacation with ryan gosling or what ever not sleep maybe you should take the clock out of your room this too shall pass almost any trying phase is that just phase buy the books wonder weeks found out about it on reddit to normalize the ups and downs of babyhood and even to be able to predict when the rough patches may come and to know its not because of you its normal and healthy my husband and would have rest time whether we slept or not we would just lay in bed of course we would always eventually fall asleep sometimes would read or my husband would dick around on his phone or we talk but there was no pressure to sleep in particular edit to add we always felt so much better whether we slept or not it was just nice to have time to ourselves play an alphabet game choose category like fruit or celebrities or tv shows and think of an example for every letter apple banana cherries usually bores me to sleep when stressed about sleeping deleted saline nose drops to help get out boogers like the nose frida but the drops help with the bulb thing too keep your phone handy used the front facing camera to see if baby was asleep on me when was at bad angle to see her face then if she was could use it to watch netflix haha just be careful taking melatonin for long periods you can become physically dependant on it since your brain slows the production of your natural melatonin if you re constantly taking it artificially my doctor says no more than weeks at time at the absolute max me too for the first months would lie in bed calculating how much sleep could get before my son would need to eat again if fell asleep at that exact second all babies are different all families are different what works for some wo work for you and vice versa do be too hard on yourself there not really set rule book just do whatever works some babies can sleep train and learn to put themselves down my daughter would cry until she threw up if tried just trying to give an example formula is fine formula is good if you are having hard time nursing it is okay you can get help or add formula you re still an amazing mom also nipple cream and oatmeal if your baby has gas problems dr brown bottles are amazing do buy too many infant sizes clothes my daughter never to to wear half her month outfits she out grew them too fast let people help you let them bring you dinner or do the dishes your house is gon na be mess it okay when you go out in public you may have constant fears of oh my god what if my baby has meltdown or starts screaming what do do most people have been there and understand they are judging you if anything they feel sympathy for you do forget your partner even though life is now all about baby make sure you still communicate and have date nights even if that means watching show together with some pizza and wine removed something wish would have know earlier was that you can take onsie off by folding down the shoulders so you do have to pull poop explosion over the baby head newborns are hard no book or parenting philosophy can prepare you so get help whenever you can it does make you failure to reach out to family and friends when you need break it just makes you human same issue here but because of how tall my daughter is those cute footie pajamas are great but unless got the six month ones she would have her feet crammed up received lots of newborn 3m clothing and all kids were ~8 lbs at birth and so tall they outgrew even the 3m stuff in weeks my first grew exceptionally fast and she was stretching out the footies of her pj by the end of her second week told my dad about it and he went emergency shopping for her and got some 6m which also only lasted weeks she grew like bad weed you do need all the crap on hospital packing lists brought two huge bags full of stuff we never used pack an outfit for each of you to go home in include sweatshirt did think about the fact that we be discharged in the chilly morning then bring shampoo and comfy nightgown to lounge in once you are well enough to be sick of the hospital gown and phone charger that it the hospital supplies the rest you ll want an empty bag to pack home all the extra diapers and stuff they will give you if you have long torso buy the bebe au lait pillow for breastfeeding we had major issues until she was finally properly positioned as in had to see lactation consultants because she would eat and that turned out to be the problem buy the teething ring my daughter hates sophie the world most expensive giraffe gerber soothe drops if your kid is colicky or constipated that your baby may get hard lumps in their breasts nipples the size of grapes and may have some around the base of the skull like tiny beads normal to buy those drool bib things buy so many white noise accessories all of em toys are expensive stock up now for later all the toys and get teeny ones for teeny hands they also sell teeny tiny books baby einstein has good set that the baby can hold and chew mean read our local children hospital has an app swedish kids that tells you when you should take your baby child in to the doctor and how to treat symptoms at home it really gave me peace of mind once we had it it also reassures me that you think your child needs to be seen is valid reason on its own to make doctor appointment to not be afraid to ask for help from siblings grandparents so ect felt like had to be super mom and do everything myself realized self care helped me become much better mom had the opposite experience my daughter would never chew the normal teething rings but she *loved* that damn squeaky giraffe haha deleted removed if you end up formula feeding get thermos that will keep water warm for 8+ hours keep it in the room with the baby for over night feedings also much easier to measure out into bottle without lot of bubbles we do foot less sleepers and tall socks voila no more squatty legs haha gt do wait to see lactation consultant seconded any sign of an issue seek one out immediately on second thought pick one out before birth to have on call breastfeeding is the easiest and simultaneously the hardest thing ve ever done that was my favorite part of pregnancy which hated overall all of the sweet touching heartwarming stories people told me people who known for years who never even mentioned their kids to me in some cases think seeing pregnant woman reminded them of all their own pregnancy and baby memories god dammit wish had thought of this two years too late question on the men diaper bag what do you use my husband is pretty minimalist he has laptop bag but it only big enough for that and some paperwork so it ca do double duty removed diaper dude makes great men diaper bags
